eu.linksmart.caf.cm
Class ContextManagerError

java.lang.Object
  eu.linksmart.caf.cm.ContextManagerError
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ContextManagerError
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents an error caught in the Context Manager.

The error contains:

  1. errorId - The id of the object causing the error
  2. errorSubject - The subject of the error, about where it was thrown
  3. errorDescription - The description of the error

Author:
Michael Crouch
See Also:
